description:
"EXCEPTIONAL"
-PCWorld

"iFAX IS A TOOL THAT I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!"
-J. Brandon, Macworld

FEATURES
● PDF and Document Integration - import from mail, upload or download from the web: PDF, DOC, XLS, JPG and other documents supported.

● Unlimited Inbound Faxing - get your own iFax number in the United States (Local or Toll-Free), Canada, UK (Local or Toll-Free), Australia, Germany, Italy, Spain, Israel & Turkey. Start receiving faxes directly to your iPhone, iPod and/or iPad - powered by Apple Push notifications! (Read further for subscription details & pricing)

● Dropbox & Box is now fully integrated. Transfer documents from Dropbox or Box and include in your fax.

● Push-Notification & Email Fax confirmations - real-time messages sent to the app with fax notifications and status updates.

● Document Scanner technology - Attach images from photo library or using camera, crop and adjust brightness, sharpness etc to optimize images for faxing. Using these tools to brighten backgrounds and darken text/foregrounds. (Darker photos will not appear clearly in a fax.) 

● Professional, customizable cover page template. You can even insert your company logo, add a note and sign your signature on the cover page!

PRIVATE & SECURE
Secure & private faxing using HIPAA-compliant, enterprise-grade fax technology.

OUTGOING FAX PRICING - PAY PER FAX
iFax Pro is powered by in-app payments. Cost of fax is determined by the number of pages (in 5 page increments) and destination.

GROUP A REGION:
USA, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, China, Cyprus, Greece, Hungary, Malta, Portugal, South Africa, Turkey, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Vatican, British Indian Ocean Territory, Christmas Islands, East Timor, Hong Kong, Japan, Korea (South), New Zealand, Northern Mariana Islands, Philippines, Pitcairn Islands, Singapore, Taiwan, Tokelau

UP TO 5 PAGES    $0.99
UP TO 10 PAGES $1.99
UP TO 15 PAGES $2.99
UP TO 20 PAGES $3.99
UP TO 25 PAGES $4.99
For more pages, details available within the app.

GROUP B REGION:
Argentina, Belize, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, South Georgia [Falklands], Uruguay, Venezuela, Belarus, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Estonia, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Romania, Russia, Serbia, Slovakia, Slovenia, Ukraine, Yugoslavia

UP TO 5 PAGES    $1.99
UP TO 10 PAGES $3.99
UP TO 15 PAGES $5.99
UP TO 20 PAGES $7.99
UP TO 25 PAGES $9.99
FOr more pages, details available within the app.

GROUP C REGION:
Egypt Israel, Jordan, Lebanon, Libya, Morocco, Qatar, Sudan, Tunisia, United Arab Emirates, Malaysia, Thailand

UP TO 5 PAGES    $2.99
UP TO 10 PAGES $5.99
UP TO 15 PAGES $8.99
UP TO 20 PAGES $11.99
UP TO 25 PAGES $14.99

For more pages and/or for other countries, details available within the app when inputting recipient fax number.

INCOMING FAX SUBSCRIPTIONS & PRICING:
Pricing for a dedicated incoming fax number service starts at just $12.99/month for UNLIMITED inbound faxes and are available for 1, 3, 6 and 12 month periods. 
- Cost depends on subscription period, location of fax number and toll-free options. All details are available from the INCOMING menu based on the region selected.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Manage subscriptions or turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period

Privacy - http://ifaxapp.com/privacy.php
